template<class T>
class BaseLayer< T >

Collision layer from which all other layers derive.

Member Function Documentation

template<class T>
bool BaseLayer< T >::BoundingSphereCollision ( PhysicalEntity *  entity1,
PhysicalEntity *  entity2 
) [inline]

Checks to see if 2 bounding spheres are colliding.

If the spheres are colliding, this moves entity1 out of collision.

Returns:
true if we are colliding
